org.jgrapes.net

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgrapes.core.internal.ComponentNode
      • org.jgrapes.core.AbstractComponent
        • org.jgrapes.net.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Component>, Channel, Component, Matchable, Manager, Connection, NioHandler

    public class Server
extends AbstractComponent
implements NioHandler, Connection
    Provides a TCP server. The server binds to the given address. If the address is null, address and port are automatically assigned.
    Author:
    Michael N. Lipp

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Server.SocketConnection
      The internal representation of a connected client.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server(java.net.SocketAddress serverAddress)
        Creates a new server listening on the given address. The channel is set to the NamedChannel "server". The size of the send and receive buffers is set to the platform defaults.
        Parameters:
        serverAddress - the address to bind to

      • Server

        public Server(Channel componentChannel,
              java.net.SocketAddress serverAddress)
        Creates a new server using the given channel and address.
        Parameters:
        componentChannel - the component's channel
        serverAddress - the address to bind to

      • Server

        public Server(java.net.SocketAddress serverAddress,
              int bufferSize)
        Creates a new server listening on the given address. The channel is set to the NamedChannel "server".
        Parameters:
        serverAddress - the address to bind to
        bufferSize - the size to use for the send and receive buffers

      • Server

        public Server(Channel componentChannel,

        Parameters:
        componentChannel - the component's channel
        serverAddress - the address to bind to
        bufferSize - the size to use for the send and receive buffers

    • Method Detail

      • getResponsePipeline

        public EventPipeline getResponsePipeline()
        Description copied from interface: Connection
        Gets an EventPipeline that can be used for events going back to the initiator on this connection. Consistently using this event pipeline for response events ensures that the events are written in proper sequence.
        Specified by:
        getResponsePipeline in interface Connection
